blog.name: myshittyironmansideblog
blog.title: a recovering alcoholic reads iron man comics
blog.description:
instead of yelling at my poor boyfriend im going to yell into the void 
| 26 years old | trans guy | ben |
i only use the mobile app so im sorry if everything is a mess. 
my main blog is @icouldreallyuseanewurl

summary: I reread Demon in a Bottle and now I have a theory about Tony Stark: Iron Man likely relapse arc! And I'm going to share...
body:
I reread Demon in a Bottle and now I have a theory about Tony Stark: Iron Man likely relapse arc! And I’m going to share it.

Tony, in Demon in a Bottle, had problem after problem pile up and not once did he reach out to anyone and ask for any amount of help.

It took Beth directly confronting him and offering her help for him to finally get any help for his problems.

Tony’s learned a lot over the years and he knows he needs to talk about his problems or he’ll end up drinking them “away.” We saw that in Civil War II when he went to an AA meeting when things were becoming overwhelming and he didn’t have Rhodey to turn to.

Tony knows this and he has reached out to Rhodey and Jocasta about his worries with ‘coming back wrong’ (also he spoke to Jan, but honestly I’m not sure what to make of his relationship with Jan)

But, Tony and these moments have felt super off. Honestly, tony has felt off since the start of this run. He’s been almost manic. We don’t see him stay still until the very end of #4 when he’s f i n a l l y relaxing with Jan on the sofa.

Even his “relaxing” we see before that is done in a montague (his date with Jan). It was hectic and all over the place. The date is when he and Jan talked about 2nd chances.

Anyway the preview for tomorrow’s issue has Tony’s mom saying:

Which is so freakin validating and relieving bc it means Slott is writing Tony this way for a purpose and not just bc he’s struggling to actually write Tony.

The eScape is Tony’s new way of dealing with how much he generally hates himself. He’s shifting away from using the Iron Man to improve himself and he’s just going to try to escape himself. It’s obviously going to fail.

I think he feels a lot of guilt from bringing Rhodes back from the dead. He’s bottling up all the emotional baggage from Carol killing him. (I mean, Tony’s hugged it out with Carol in her comics, but in Tony’s we haven’t seen much response to Civil War II.) Tony was in a coma when everyone else got to recover. Tony also hasn’t dealt with his birth father also being a piece of shit and seeing him dead on the balcony.

Tony has problems and he’s trying to push them all aside and act like his only problem is if he has a soul, which tony has said in the comics that he doesn’t believe in “souls.”

As a side note: i think it’s going to be Tony’s mom who helps him with recovery.

Tl:dr tony is going through the motions of asking for help. He’s trying to eScape his actual problems and it’s going to fail and he’s going to relapse. And i am big sad about it.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: 101 Times Steve Rogers was the 'mum' friend.
title: 101 Times Steve Rogers was the 'mum' friend.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qXDtaV

by FezzesAndCheekbones

A variety of fics, with different lengths, in which Steve is being the typical mum friend to the rest of the Avengers.

Words: 1918, Chapters: 3/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel)

summary: Everyone out here stanning stony and stuff but are y’all forgetting about the amazing ship we already had, Pepperony? Like they...
body: Everyone out here stanning stony and stuff but are y’all forgetting about the amazing ship we already had, Pepperony? Like they still are like wine of the purest couples in the MCU? Did y’all forget?

tags: alien prince tony!!! space pirate Steve!!!!
they're flying on a starrhip called Nomad!!!
I had so much fun working with GuardianMira and Lore
summary: Steve rose to his feet, slowly, and crossed his arms in that way he knew made his biceps bulge. “You. Tampered. With. My. Ship?”...
caption:
Steve rose to his feet, slowly, and crossed his arms in that way he knew made his biceps bulge.
“You. Tampered. With. My. Ship?” he asked, in his deadliest tone of voice.The Stark gave him exactly the sort of arrogant smirk that was guaranteed to make Steve’s blood boil.

By Guidance of the Stars by GuardianMira

I took a part in Cap/IM BigBang 2018 and look what an amazing partner I’ve got! GuardianMira wrote a great story that has a blue alien prince!Tony and cute rebel!Steve, starships, stargazing and of course falling in love in space - please, read it!

Also besides me the fic have an another artist illustrating the story! Lore did an amazing job, check her out on ao3 as Lets_call_me_Lily HERE [X]


Instagram || Twitter || Ko-fi

I do commissions!

photos.caption: “Just think of me as… a souvenir. A very shiny, very pretty souvenir from the greatest moon in the galaxy.”
They stood so close that, had Tony taken off the helmet, they would have been breathing each other’s air.
Space wasn’t infinite, of course. Not really.

body:
Electricity | Chapter 2

Description: December 16th, 1991.

One date, one day, 24 hours.

The whole world remembers that day as the day of death of Howard Stark and his wife Maria Stark.

But the truth is, something else happened during that day.

Something that only one person knows about.

Warnings: cursing

Hey, here’s the second chapter. Things are getting heated. ;) Hope you enjoy! xx

MASTERLIST


3:16 AM, 17th December 2009

“Shit”

Y/N found herself struggling to get up from the ground, as she tripped over her own legs and fell. She exhaled heavily as she sat on the street. The eighteen-year-old girl put her hands through her hair as she tried to think about how she managed to get here. She was literally sitting in the middle of nowhere. Only the moon illuminated the street, as there wasn’t any light. Y/N figured she must’ve been somewhere on the outskirts of New York.

The girl groaned as she searched for her phone in her jacket. She smiled to herself triumphantly as she pulled it out of her left pocket. Y/N tried to dial her father’s number, but sadly, there was no signal.

“Great, just great” she muttered a few curses under her breath as she put her phone back into her jacket and tried to stand up.

The alcohol that she had drunk a few hours before was still present in her blood, thus she had major problems with being on her feet. She took a deep breath and started slowly walking ahead. Y/N had no idea where she was going but she knew she had to keep moving.

“Jeez, why am I always so stupid?” she cursed herself for her inability to drink like a normal person.

Yesterday, she turned eighteen years old. Obviously, she had partied like crazy, but if she knew it would end like that, maybe she would have rather stayed at home. The girl tried very hard to remember what had happened last night but all she had in her head was a big, blank space.

How did she end up here? She couldn’t just walk there by herself. Someone must’ve had given her a ride. But then, why would that someone leave a drunk girl alone in the middle of nowhere? She had so many questions.

“Ugh, dad is gonna kill me” she put her head on her forehead and closed her eyes. “Come on, Y/N, you have to remember something”

As she was so concentrated, she got startled when she heard the sound of a car. She turned around, as it seemed someone was going towards her. The girl smiled. Maybe someone was going to give her a ride back home, hopefully.

After a few seconds, she saw a black car driving towards where she was standing. She walked out on the road, trying to get it to stop.

The car came to an abrupt stop a few meters before her. Y/N smiled to herself, as she walked shakily towards the driver’s side. The window started opening slowly.

“Hi, I’m sorry, but I think I got lost. Are you going to New York? Could you give me a ride?” she smiled as sweetly as she could when she saw the face of the driver. It was a man in his forties. He was dressed in black, his blonde hair slicked back. He wasn’t very handsome, having a quite scare jaw and a big nose. His narrow lips curled in a terrifying smirk as his brown eyes glowed in the moonlight.

She suddenly regretted that she found herself in this situation. She didn’t want anything to do with this shady man at all. But, he was her only way of getting home.

“Sure, sugar. Hop on in” he had a devious grin on his face, as he gestured to the empty seat on his right.

Y/N smiled at him again, as she walked in front of the car and opened the door to the passenger seat. She cursed herself in her head again, as she got in and closed the door.

The man started driving ahead. For a moment, they were both silent. Y/N was questioning all of her life choices in this very moment, as the man still wore an awful smirk on his face.

“What’s your name, sugar?” he looked at her, showing his teeth. Oh, how she hated this nickname. She looked at him and cleared her throat.

“I’m Y/N.” she smirked at him, trying to hide her true emotions. The girl started inspecting his car, trying to find any suspicious things, but everything seemed to be perfectly okay.

“The name’s Damien.” the blonde man took her hand in his and kissed it, looking her in the eyes. She stared at him with wide eyes and smiled falsely. This man was starting to get more and more creepy with each passing second.

“Uhm, you have a really nice car” she stuttered, trying to compliment him in some way, in case he wanted to kill her later. It was her second day being an adult and she really didn’t want to get killed. That would be slightly irresponsible, wouldn’t it?

“Thank you” he smiled tightly, as muscles in his jaw twitched. “What is such a beautiful girl doing here alone at this hour?” he looked at her with fake curiosity.

Y/N thought for a moment. “To be honest, I myself have no idea” she laughed a little.

The man hummed to himself as if he had known what her answer would be.

“Oh god, look what’s outside the window!” he shouted as he looked in her way. Her eyes widened, her head going to the right, looking out the window.

“Wait, what? There is noth-“ the man, Damien, hit her head with the back of his gun that he pulled out of his jacket. Y/N fell down on the seat, unconscious.

The blonde man exhaled deeply, grinning once again. He pulled his phone out of his pocket and dialed a number.

“Everything went down right with the plan. I’m going back to the base.” his smile faltered, as he barked into the phone.

The black car took a sharp turn and speeded off in the opposite direction.

TAGS:

@chook007

@thatfishontheleft

@prxttybirdz

@thatfishontheleft

@prxttybirdz

trail.content_raw:
Electricity | Chapter 2

Description: December 16th, 1991.

One date, one day, 24 hours.

The whole world remembers that day as the day of death of Howard Stark and his wife Maria Stark.

But the truth is, something else happened during that day.

Something that only one person knows about.

Warnings: cursing

Hey, here’s the second chapter. Things are getting heated. ;) Hope you enjoy! xx

MASTERLIST


3:16 AM, 17th December 2009

“Shit”

Y/N found herself struggling to get up from the ground, as she tripped over her own legs and fell. She exhaled heavily as she sat on the street. The eighteen-year-old girl put her hands through her hair as she tried to think about how she managed to get here. She was literally sitting in the middle of nowhere. Only the moon illuminated the street, as there wasn’t any light. Y/N figured she must’ve been somewhere on the outskirts of New York.

The girl groaned as she searched for her phone in her jacket. She smiled to herself triumphantly as she pulled it out of her left pocket. Y/N tried to dial her father’s number, but sadly, there was no signal.

“Great, just great” she muttered a few curses under her breath as she put her phone back into her jacket and tried to stand up.

The alcohol that she had drunk a few hours before was still present in her blood, thus she had major problems with being on her feet. She took a deep breath and started slowly walking ahead. Y/N had no idea where she was going but she knew she had to keep moving.

“Jeez, why am I always so stupid?” she cursed herself for her inability to drink like a normal person.

Yesterday, she turned eighteen years old. Obviously, she had partied like crazy, but if she knew it would end like that, maybe she would have rather stayed at home. The girl tried very hard to remember what had happened last night but all she had in her head was a big, blank space.

How did she end up here? She couldn’t just walk there by herself. Someone must’ve had given her a ride. But then, why would that someone leave a drunk girl alone in the middle of nowhere? She had so many questions.

“Ugh, dad is gonna kill me” she put her head on her forehead and closed her eyes. “Come on, Y/N, you have to remember something”

As she was so concentrated, she got startled when she heard the sound of a car. She turned around, as it seemed someone was going towards her. The girl smiled. Maybe someone was going to give her a ride back home, hopefully.

After a few seconds, she saw a black car driving towards where she was standing. She walked out on the road, trying to get it to stop.

The car came to an abrupt stop a few meters before her. Y/N smiled to herself, as she walked shakily towards the driver’s side. The window started opening slowly.

“Hi, I’m sorry, but I think I got lost. Are you going to New York? Could you give me a ride?” she smiled as sweetly as she could when she saw the face of the driver. It was a man in his forties. He was dressed in black, his blonde hair slicked back. He wasn’t very handsome, having a quite scare jaw and a big nose. His narrow lips curled in a terrifying smirk as his brown eyes glowed in the moonlight.

She suddenly regretted that she found herself in this situation. She didn’t want anything to do with this shady man at all. But, he was her only way of getting home.

“Sure, sugar. Hop on in” he had a devious grin on his face, as he gestured to the empty seat on his right.

Y/N smiled at him again, as she walked in front of the car and opened the door to the passenger seat. She cursed herself in her head again, as she got in and closed the door.

The man started driving ahead. For a moment, they were both silent. Y/N was questioning all of her life choices in this very moment, as the man still wore an awful smirk on his face.

“What’s your name, sugar?” he looked at her, showing his teeth. Oh, how she hated this nickname. She looked at him and cleared her throat.

“I’m Y/N.” she smirked at him, trying to hide her true emotions. The girl started inspecting his car, trying to find any suspicious things, but everything seemed to be perfectly okay.

“The name’s Damien.” the blonde man took her hand in his and kissed it, looking her in the eyes. She stared at him with wide eyes and smiled falsely. This man was starting to get more and more creepy with each passing second.

“Uhm, you have a really nice car” she stuttered, trying to compliment him in some way, in case he wanted to kill her later. It was her second day being an adult and she really didn’t want to get killed. That would be slightly irresponsible, wouldn’t it?

“Thank you” he smiled tightly, as muscles in his jaw twitched. “What is such a beautiful girl doing here alone at this hour?” he looked at her with fake curiosity.

Y/N thought for a moment. “To be honest, I myself have no idea” she laughed a little.

The man hummed to himself as if he had known what her answer would be.

“Oh god, look what’s outside the window!” he shouted as he looked in her way. Her eyes widened, her head going to the right, looking out the window.

“Wait, what? There is noth-“ the man, Damien, hit her head with the back of his gun that he pulled out of his jacket. Y/N fell down on the seat, unconscious.

The blonde man exhaled deeply, grinning once again. He pulled his phone out of his pocket and dialed a number.

“Everything went down right with the plan. I’m going back to the base.” his smile faltered, as he barked into the phone.

The black car took a sharp turn and speeded off in the opposite direction.

TAGS:

@chook007

@thatfishontheleft

@prxttybirdz

Y/N thought for a moment. “To be honest, I myself have no idea” she laughed a little.

The man hummed to himself as if he had known what her answer would be.

blog.title: Iron Dad All Day Every Day
blog.description: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers and Peter Parker have taken over my life. I write stories and then cry over them.

tags: why u make me do this to my bbs anon
summary: Consider this: Tony and Peter get into an argument so bad Peter storms out of the lab and is like, kidnapped or something, to...
question: Consider this: Tony and Peter get into an argument so bad Peter storms out of the lab and is like, kidnapped or something, to get to Tony Stark. So no Peter is at the mercy of some people thinking Tony Stark isn't coming for him and maybe???
answer:
no anon no why u doing this

It was a pretty stupid argument, in hindsight, too. Peter tired of being treated like a kid - you know the usual. Usually Tony takes it in stride, but he just had another big falling out with Pepper and was not in the mood at all. He lets Peter storm off, as they can both use the time to let off some steam.

A few hours later, he’s about to send a text to the kid that he was sorry and they needed to talk when Friday notifies him of an anonymous video message. Something cold grips at Tony’s heart and he knows deep down it’s not good. Sure enough, he’s thrust into a living nightmare when he opens the video and is met with his kid, strapped down to a chair, duct tape over his mouth and face smeared with dry blood, fresh tears, and bruises.

blog.name: tonystarkismyprompt
blog.title: Tony Stark Fanfic Prompts
blog.description:
Basically a bunch of prompts about Tony Stark/the Avengers. 
(please write me some fics)

tags: tony comes back even more bamf
body:
Tony Stark Prompt:

“Who are you?”

“Guys, it’s me. Tony Stark? Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist? The one who makes all of you look cool and pays for everything?”

“Stop. Tony Stark is dead, he has been for five years. Not to mention you look nothing like him.”

“Oh yeah. About that… see I almost died but then Loki and I had a little heart to heart and I think there was a recovery period which might explain the time gap and some stuff happened that changed… me… but the point is I’m here now. And with a surprise, too.”

summary: SHURI #5 NNEDI OKORAFOR (W) • LEONARDO ROMERO (A) Cover by SAM SPRATT THE TWO BADDEST GAUNTLET-WIELDERS IN THE MARVEL UNIVERSE...
caption:
SHURI #5
NNEDI OKORAFOR (W) • LEONARDO ROMERO (A)
Cover by SAM SPRATT

THE TWO BADDEST GAUNTLET-WIELDERS IN THE MARVEL UNIVERSE UNITE!
An alien creature has invaded Wakanda! And with her powers strangely malfunctioning and her brother still missing, Shuri is in over her head. Time to call for backup. Enter: Iron Man! But can these two tech geniuses figure out how to de-power an energy-sucking alien before it destroys the entire continent? Don’t miss the end of the first arc — and a dramatic change for the princess of Wakanda!

summary: Everyone is going to be sad if Tony dies in Avengers 4, but won't it be worse if he lives, because then he'll probably be one of...
body: Everyone is going to be sad if Tony dies in Avengers 4, but won’t it be worse if he lives, because then he’ll probably be one of the few remaining original 6 avengers, so he will have to deal with survivor’s guilt and depression kind of like iron man 3, but worse

blog.name: justamarvelfangirl
blog.title: avenge the fallen
blog.description: emma | marvel trash | i watched endgame and i think i need therapy

summary:
Tony: Ok, Pete, say dada.
Baby Peter: ...
Tony: Come on, Peter say dada.
Baby Peter: ...
Tony: *spills coffee on himself* OH...
body:
Tony: Ok, Pete, say dada.

Baby Peter: …

Tony: Come on, Peter say dada.

Baby Peter: …

Tony: *spills coffee on himself* OH FUCK

Tony: *leaves to change his shirt*

Pepper: *walks in* How’s my little Petey doing?

Baby Peter: Fuck.

Pepper: *le gasp* Who taught you that language?

Baby Peter: Dada.

Tony: *from the other room* Traitor!
